title: Wangscape tiles schema
description: Lists the contents and location of every tile output by a Wangscape project.

items.title: Tile schema
items.description: Specifies the contents and location of a tile output by Wangscape.

corners.title: Tile corners schema
corners.description: Specifies the IDs of the terrain types at the corners of the tile.

filename.title: Tile filename schema
filename.description: Specifies the filename of the tileset containing the tile.

x.title: Tile x offset schema
x.description: Specifies the horizontal offset, in pixels, of the tile within the tileset.

y.title: Tile y offset schema
y.description: Specifies the vertical offset, in pixels, of the tile within the tileset
